Merge library-browser-features: Cache-first image loading system

Merges the library-browser-features branch which implements a complete overhaul of the image loading system with major performance improvements.

Key features:
- Hash-based image deduplication (no duplicate downloads)
- Client-side cache prediction (instant loading for cached images)
- Sequential queue processing (all images load correctly)
- Smart callback system (multiple items can share same image)
- Visual loading states with smooth animations

Performance impact:
- First load: Normal speed (downloads as needed)
- Subsequent loads: Instant (0ms, zero C++ overhead)
- Shared images: Single download for N items
